extendedInfo.description: This is the "Pro" version of Time Recording, market leader in timesheet apps in the Google Play store.â PLEASE USE THE FREE VERSION FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS BEFORE GOING PRO! Refund time is too short to test all the features, the free version has all the core functionality.â¢ Free and Pro versions are basically identical, so free version users will feel at home.â¢ Main "Pro only" feature is Â«Google calendar syncÂ», plus it's ad-free.â¢ Migration to Pro is easy: install and open "Pro" - the app will prompt for import of data and settings from the free version.â¢ Usage of Free and Pro version in parallel is supported but may lead to confusion. Consider uninstalling the free version a few days after "Pro" migration.â For detailed changelog see FAQ.â App also available on www.androidpit.com for those who want to pay through PayPal.

reviews.title: Excellent after using daily for 1 year
reviews.comment: This application is a real winner. It has a simple ui that lets me quickly enter tasks and account for my time. While the interface is simple, the functionality of this software is complex and very useful.
reviews.author: David Barbee

reviews.title: Good, but....
reviews.comment: I love this app, super useful, but the ability to track multiple jobs and have seperate deltas for each job, would make it way better. Since I, like many other people have more than one job, it\'d be great to be able to track all of them
reviews.author: Zachery Loflin

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Excellent product by a superior developer. Many built in functions, from personal experience after messing up my phone data this developer has very strong knowledge of this and other software so please buy it and be sure to follow the instructions correctly. Used on S3, S3 LET, and now Sony Xperia.
reviews.author: Tristan Tonks

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is great. I use it all the time, works perfect, does the math and backs up perfectly. Many different options depending on how your paid.
reviews.author: Joel Lewis

reviews.title: essential tool for any professional
reviews.comment: tested over four months, it has become part of the tool box. it is seamlessly integrated with excel for sophisticated analyses and automated billing.
reviews.author: Eugenio Magnone

reviews.title: JG
reviews.comment: There is simply nothing better out there.. Well worth the expense! SE Xperia Arc. Just recently bought an SE Xperia Z, now on 4.2.2. Started using the Calendar Sync feature and all of sudden it isn\'t syncing even though I do get the notification that the entry sync is done. I\'m wondering if something has changed. Anyone have this problem?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, very efficient
reviews.comment: The best app to save your work hours, the only thing is missing for my opinion is exporting data to excel but still I give it a 5.
reviews.author: Idan Emergy

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I worked constriction.  This is a good way to keep track of hours so companies can\'t stiff you.
reviews.author: adrian macias

reviews.title: Wonderfull app
reviews.comment: Just wish I could add a re-occuring tasks. (I get automated emails every morning which I read for checking, so I\'d like for the program to automaticly add that tasks every day)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost exactly what I need...
reviews.comment: This app is almost perfect for me. The only thing I can\'t figure out is a way to have my two jobs listed with those sperate rates.
reviews.author: Vidal Muro

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app is great and the widget is awesome.
reviews.author: Dan Loffert

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It wotks great and does everything I need. I would have given it 5 stars if I could attach pictures or documents to a check in in notes.
reviews.author: Ric TacoPaco Garcia

reviews.title: excellent app
reviews.comment: i am a consultant and this app works great, i highly recommend it
reviews.author: Brian Mccoy

reviews.comment: Very usefull app
reviews.author: Tony Carter

reviews.title: Better Icon
reviews.comment: Needs a better looking and higher resolution icon to complete this excellent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add a time for yesterday?
reviews.comment: Is it possible to add time against work I did yesterday?
reviews.author: Casey Goodhew

reviews.title: Great time keeper
reviews.comment: Not that I have to but, I track all my working hours, and effortlessly with this app on my phone. One of my mobile \342\200\234Essentials\".
reviews.author: Terry Drymonacos

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for a year now and it\'s the only one of its kind which I still have installed and use. I especially love the data and settings remote backup/restore option (it came in handy when I got a new device). All paid features are worth it.
reviews.author: Raul E. Fernandez

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Totally worth it so glad i bought. Dont forget you can make the widget a clock machine. I nearly didnt use until i found this in the settings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Simply the best time recording app!
reviews.author: Chris Matusiewicz
